Report of May 2012

* Ubuntu-gr received the Loco CD package from Shipit
* The Greek team participate in Fosscomm 2012 at Serres with a beautiful booth and two presentations from ouw member <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/simosx|simosx]]</nowiki> and Qdata. See photos <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-gr.org/content/fosscomm-2012|here]]</nowiki>
* Release parties 12.04 in <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-gr.org/content/athens-release-party-1204|Athens]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-gr.org/content/lamia-release-party-1204|Lamia]]</nowiki>

See all team reports <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/GreekTeam/TeamReports|here]]</nowiki>.
